text:
Hii Everyone,
I have one query.
In the email template, I have inserted image through token..
In the custom module i have taken img tag and in the src i have passed the value of the rich text... but i think rich text is updated . when i passed token in the rich text.  btu P tag  automatically created dont know why . like

<img src="<p>image link</p>">
thats why image is not displayed.

if anyone know please let me know how i remove the p tag.

Not sure. Why you'd want to use richtext for this but regardless, i would just use a text field or an image field depending on what you're trying to actually do.

I'm assuming you are trying to pull a contacts field value. If thats the case theres no need to do this rich text editor hack just put the hubl directly in your custom module or template
Rich text fields are wysiwyg type fields they will generate html and html is invalid inside of an image's SRC

So when doing some spam tests, there is a small 1x1 px image that is at the bottom of the emails (I am assuming tracking pixel) but this `img` has no alt text and is causing a small decrease  (~-0.5) hit for a spam score. Is there a way that HS can add a small alt tag to this. Even if its something like the company name or name it beacon or something
can probably make the alt text be  `&nbsp;`
it would have to be HubSpot that makes the change as its their beacon
